Generation VI.X: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.
Generation VI.Y: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person's arm and drains that person's life energy completely.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person's arm and drains that person's life energy completely.

Generation VIII.Sword: Honedge's soul once belonged to a person who was killed a long time ago by the sword that makes up Honedge's body.
Generation VIII.Shield: The blue eye on the sword's handguard is the true body of Honedge. With its old cloth, it drains people's lives away.

Generation VIII.Sword: Hammerlocke Hills Watchtower Ruins , Stony Wilderness Sh , Giant's Seat , Dusty Bowl ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Hammerlocke Hills Watchtower Ruins , Stony Wilderness Sh , Giant's Seat , Dusty Bowl ( Max Raid Battle )
